article.title: McGinn Assigned to Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics)

tags.tag: Office of the Undersecretary of Defense for Acquisition

article.text: John G. McGinn has been appointed to the Senior Executive Service and is assigned as the principal deputy director, manufacturing and industrial base policy, Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics), Washington, D.C.
